DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate blood flow restriction training rehabilitation modality follow total knee arthroplasty order determine patient report outcomes objective functional outcome improve post-operative rehabilitation compare standard physical therapy modality currently use .
DOC.brief_title: Blood Flow Restriction Training Following Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Patients enrol preoperatively order measure preoperative functional measure . They follow predetermined interval post-operatively . All subject begin study related physical therapy 6 week post-operatively continue 12 session . At conclusion 12 session , subject retested determine improvement . Subjects follow two year post-operative .
